name: GRAMODHAYA SOCIAL SERVICE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Gramodhaya works among the poor and the marginalised people living in the rural areas and slums in Tirunelveli and Tuticorin Districts. About 180,000 people benefit from our services in the following sectors:Women and Children Development, Education, Health, Water-Sanitation-Hygiene, HIV/AIDS, Agriculture-organic farming, Vocational Skill Trainings, Livelihoods, Emergency and Disaster Relief and Rehabilitation.
